name: Google Logo-Halo Reach Noble Team
description:
Simpye makes the google logo into the noble team from Halo reach
Works for google.com, .se, .de, .co.uk, .it, .es, .no and .fr.
If you want it to another google please leave a comment or edit it yourself if you know how, its a pretty easy code
additional_info: Will better on the .de, .co.uk, .it, .es and .fr. logo
